titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the discovery and apprehension of William Ruthen and Patricke Ruthen, brethren to the late Earle of Gowrie.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Burghley the 27. day of Aprill, 1603. In the first yeere of our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
